Class MazeGenerator

java.lang.Object
projatlab.algorithms.generators.MazeGenerator
Direct Known Subclasses:
MazeGeneratorDFS, MazeGeneratorKruskal, MazeGeneratorPrim
public class MazeGenerator extends Object
Class responsible for generating mazes using specific algorithms.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    boolean
    finished
    Indicates true if the maze generation is complete.
    boolean
    imperfectionsIntroduced
    Flag to make sure imperfections are only introduced once.
    Boolean
    isPerfect
    Indicates if the maze is perfect or not.

    Reference to the maze being generated.
    Random

    Random number generator.

  • Method Details

    • removeWalls

      public void removeWalls(Cell a, Cell b)
      Removes the wall between two adjacent cells a and b.
      Parameters:
      a - the first cell.
      b - the second cell.

    • step

      public void step()
      Performs one stop of the maze generation algorithm.

    • getUnvisitedNeighbors

      public List<Cell> getUnvisitedNeighbors(Cell cell)
      Return a list of all unvisited neighboring cells of a given cell.
      Parameters:
      cell - : a cell.
      Returns:
      unvisited neighbors of the Cell cell.

    • getVisitedNeighbors

      public List<Cell> getVisitedNeighbors(Cell cell)
      Return a list of all visited neighboring cells of a given cell.
      Parameters:
      cell - : a cell.
      Returns:
      : visited neighbors of the Cell cell.

    • isFinished

      public boolean isFinished()
      Return true if the maze generation is finished.
      Returns:
      true if generation is complete, false otherwise.

    • introduceImperfections

      public void introduceImperfections(int extraWallsToRemove, int extraWallsToAdd)
      Introduces imperfections in the maze after generation. Adds cycles (removes walls between already connected cells) and dead-ends (adds walls between connected cells).
      Parameters:
      extraWallsToRemove - Number of additional walls to remove to introduce cycles.
      extraWallsToAdd - Number of walls to add to create dead-ends.
